Through heartfelt stories of love, resilience, and community, discover how theyre not just settling in, but helping Taiwan shine brighter.

programme.title: Battle Tour Ep122
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1078
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1079
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World Ep791
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom. <>

programme.title: Mr.Player Ep565
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Way Back Into Love Ep16
programme.desc: Way Back into Love follows Xiao-qing Yang, who returns to her hometown Hualien with her daughter to help run her familys guesthouse. Reuniting with her childhood friend Bi-zhong, a quiet romance rekindles. Meanwhile, a fiery connection sparks with architect Zhi-bin during a renovation project. Caught between two men with contrasting values, Xiao-qing must navigate love, identity, and homecoming amid emotional twists and lifes rediscoveries.

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: I Fineâ€¦ Thank Youâ€¦ Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: Washed-up stunt director Li Sen is offered the role of action choreographer on his director friends final film. Bringing along an ambitious young stuntman, the two generations risk everything to stage a comeback. As Li Sen battles his fierce temper and past mistakes, he also strives to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighbouring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: Ready O/R Rot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi are finally getting married but pressure from Guys mother creates much friction between them. Meanwhile, Grey Bear suspects his wife of cheating on him and Ken faces the biggest crisis of his life when Jessica accidentally gets pregnant. Can they eventually solve their relationship problems?

programme.title: Prosecutor, The
programme.desc: Based on a true case, young Ma Jia Jie pleads guilty to drug trafficking in exchange for a lighter sentence, as coerced by his defense lawyer. Huo Zi Hao, a former cop turned prosecutor, believes in his innocence and launches an investigation. Risking his life and career, Huo is determined to uncover the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Happy New Year!!
programme.desc: Business tycoon Duan is kidnapped and seriously injured by the "Shadow Empire", accidentally losing his memory. Duan is looked after by Su, a temple owner, and as he slowly recovers, Duan discovers that he has been replaced by a doppelgnger, prompting him to uncover a shocking hidden secret.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers' claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his family's declining status. Lin visits his fiance before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin's bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Devil's Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father's death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewellery heist by his former boss who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when Chiang Yi discovers his first love working in the jewellery store.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Pursuit Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts world

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons Of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kung's brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies' youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Cat Vs Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma S1 Ep93
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Hagola S1 Ep12
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Hagola S1 Ep13
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets' sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo S1 Ep9
programme.desc: A superhero child and his special car, Super Speedo, go on adventiures to save the world from villains.

programme.title: Honey Bunny As Police Patrol S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep148
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep149

programme.title: Paap O Meter S1 Ep57
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru S1 Ep32
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Bad Influence
programme.desc: A single mom is overjoyed when her daughter finally makes friends at her new high school. Soon, however, it becomes clear that this group of students follows their own moral code thats strange, self-centered, and possibly dangerous.

programme.title: The Wrong Daughter
programme.desc: Kate and Joe are considering in-vitro options when a child Kate gave up 17 years ago resurfaces. Danica moves in with Kate and as time passes, cracks begin to appear, is she really Kate's daughter?

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme battles terrorists at a hockey game to save the Vice President and stop a stadium bombing in this explosive thriller. Can he stall the game long enough? Its Sudden Death!

programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and crew face a deadly new enemyDeckard Shawseeking revenge in this high-octane chapter of the Fast & Furious saga. Action explodes as the team fights to protect their own.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme battles terrorists at a hockey game to save the Vice President and stop a stadium bombing in this explosive thriller. Can he stall the game long enough? Its Sudden Death!

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her familys estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Happiness - Griff Rhys Jones finishes his journey across Canada in the popular, lifestyle province of British Columbia in the Pacific Northwest and discovers what it is about this place that makes people so happy.

programme.title: Planet Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: From Pole to Pole - This episode journeys across the planet, from pole to pole, following the influence of the sun and discovering how its seasonal journey affects the lives of all who live on earth.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Protecting Primates - Today, more than half of the world's primates are under threat of extinction. Meet the scientists making groundbreaking discoveries about this remarkable animal family.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep6
programme.desc: End Game - Our ancient powers have endured for centuries but destruction is close at hand. What will cause their downfall? And who will create a lasting legacy?

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S11 Ep10
programme.desc: Utah - Ben visits Scott Brodie in Utah, who has built an off-grid life in the Canyonlands, and the episode explores Scott's resilience and the "prepper" mindset.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep21
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into food factories. Today we see the production of hot sauce, lemon Italian ice and packed peanuts.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep22
programme.desc: A look at the production of food in the our food factories. This episode looks at the factories producing mustard, wafer biscuits, teriyaki sauce and coconut macaroons.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Colourful Planet - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep6

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep23
programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories. This episode looks at factories producing cola, pickled beetroot, swiss rolls and yoghurt.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep24
programme.desc: See billions of Sixlets candies, or the 40,000 heads of cabbage to make 400,000 Zarky's cabbage rolls. Plus American Farmer sweet and salty popcorn is popped, and TGI Friday and Indenture Foods potato skins chips look deli fresh.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Heartlands - Magical forests wrap around a labyrinth of waterways in Scandinavia's heartlands. Here, lynxes, wolves and reindeer survive the ever-changing seasons through surprising alliances.

programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the remote and little-visited north east of South America, from Venezuela to French Guiana.

programme.desc: Series 5 - Five intrepid duos race over 14,000km across Asia, the world's largest continent.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Danube: Europe's Mightiest River S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Slovakia and Hungary - Joanna discovers that the "blue Danube" is both a constant reminder of Europe's unchanging beauty, its past triumphs and current threats - and the thread that keeps it powerfully connected.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher's pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Protectors - A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beetle Mania - Get a sanitation lesson from nature's original cleanup crew. Learn how beetles keep ecosystems in balance with clever biological weapons like tusks and toxic sprays, then see why the 6,000-plus species of dung beetles are the world's unsung heroes.

programme.title: Deep In The Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star State's landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas' unique habitats.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the 'arribada', or 'arrival'. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher's pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Get chills as winter descends, slowing down life on the bustling reef. Meander with reef sharks and octopuses, visit a coral oasis atop an old shipwreck, and spot a banded snake eel's talent for identity theft when it disguises itself as a predator.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Deep In The Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star State's landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas' unique habitats.

programme.desc: The Protectors - A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep4

programme.title: Deep In The Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star State's landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas' unique habitats.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the 'arribada', or 'arrival'. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Ocean Oddballs - Dive into the lives of the ocean's weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fish's eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: Valley Of Flood And Fire S1 Ep2
programme.desc: After the Rains - As the dry season takes hold in Zambia's Luangwa Valley, lagoons will start to dry-up and verdant grasslands will gradually turn to dust. Animals must make the most of the wet season's legacy whilst they can.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand there's plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Nova Scotia - At either edge of the province, Nova Scotia proves that any beach is built from raw forces in opposition, but also that balance between those forces is necessary if life is to thrive.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The Yucatn Peninsula is home to tourists, sea turtles, and sargassum seaweed. How do the three coexist in harmony? Is it sustainable? Uncover the secrets behind this Mexican beach, including an ancient birthing ritual that takes place each year.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Get ready to understand the science behind Hawaii's stunning beaches. Why does sand appear white, yellow, black, green and red? How do active volcanoes change the coastline? Are other forces at play in shaping these incredible beaches?

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - It's a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The beaches of California are some of the most beautiful in the world, but are they falling out of balance due to mankind's effects on nature? What does it take for the magnificent fauna of the Pacific Coast to keep living on the living beach?

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Place in the Wild - Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya's rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Masked Bandits - Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cool South - Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trip's final lap in the untamed lands where Australia's interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here - the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. He's not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, it's a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Acacia Loop - As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula's Journey - Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.desc: The Outcasts - In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here - the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. He's not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Living on the Edge - The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, it's a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Acacia Loop - As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula's Journey - Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Anatomy Gone Wild - Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Valley Of Flood And Fire S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - Africa's Great Rift Valley supports an extraordinary mosaic of animals that depend on two vastly different seasons: the wet and the dry. See what animals do to survive an unforgiving dry season that's set to last for another three months.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it's wildlife.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Memoirs of Acacia - Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rock Splitter - The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hollow Heart - This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years that can withstand the harshest conditions and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any otherthe enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Indonesia - Life in the Muck - Buried beneath a seabed littered with trash, a community of strange and fascinating creatures thrives against all odds. In this mucky ecosystem, predators and prey run an evolutionary arms race developing unlikely techniques of attack and defense.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Maldives - Paradise Shrinking - The Maldives face an uncertain future as rising sea levels threaten to wipe out the tiny island. See how researchers are rebuilding the reef around the island, working to save sea turtles, and uncovering complex behaviours of resident manta rays.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean's top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beast Buddies - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends S1 Ep6
programme.desc: To the Rescue - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Discover the most fantastic city of them all lying beneath the waves, where romance and migratory commuters flood the coral reef's main highways. Follow a green sea turtle looking for love and sit in with a cassowary dad tending his newborn chicks.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Feel the heat of summer's arrival as supersize sea snails try to fend off an invading gang of coral-hungry starfish. Accompany reef sharks as they prowl for a midnight meal and marvel at the slippery disguise a parrotfish uses to survive the night.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Get chills as winter descends, slowing down life on the bustling reef. Meander with reef sharks and octopuses, visit a coral oasis atop an old shipwreck, and spot a banded snake eel's talent for identity theft when it disguises itself as a predator.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 6 - Music Week brings a pattern for a parka once loved by the Mods, old denim gets the country music treatment, and David Bowie inspires the sewers for their Made to Measure outfits.

programme.desc: Didsbury and Hove - George meets a family of five with a Victorian coach house that's more 1960s than 1860s, and helps a young couple in Hove get to grips with a 16th-century gate house.

programme.desc: Series 9, Episode 14 - For the semi-final, it's all eyes on the skies for Rav's cloud cake Technical Challenge. In the Showstopper, the bakers recreate their favourite holidays in the form of mini tartlets.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep25
programme.desc: Memory Spark / Wondertusk - Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep26
programme.desc: Clamshell Day - Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it the Kelp way.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like Piper can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep20
programme.desc: Lucky And The Lion - When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, its time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercats Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep4
programme.desc: What Goes Eep Must Come Dawn - After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep17
programme.desc: We Meat Again - After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert but magical chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep18
programme.desc: A Hair-ifying Night - Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep19
programme.desc: Please Hold for the Next Representative - Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think theyve solved one issue, another springs up and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep15
programme.desc: Ride or Die - After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep16
programme.desc: Empty Fireworm Nest - When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, DAngelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep11
programme.desc: Shock and Awww - Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep19
programme.desc: Magma Comes to the Surface - The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep7
programme.desc: Reign Of Fireworms - Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep13
programme.desc: Twinsanity - Hiccup and the gang struggle to uphold the traditions that keep the peace between Berk and the Beserkers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble in Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep33
programme.desc: Nepal: Yeti Or Not - When a Yeti is spotted in Nepal, chasing away all the locals, the Wanderers investigate only to find out its another Odlulu plot. They must work with Wizard Rockybeard to stop Yeti-Fritz get the Furball Key back

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep10
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods / Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep7
programme.desc: Tears Of Balmera - Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon.Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep25
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick - When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep1
programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean its time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep10
programme.desc: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back - When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep11
programme.desc: Itty Bitty Blossom - The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep12
programme.desc: Dollhouse Store Day - When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnips Music Store!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep8
programme.desc: Crushing It - As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep28
programme.desc: Don't Worry Be Peppy / Two's A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesnt feel useful now thats hes no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branchs bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep18
programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep19
programme.desc: Magma Comes to the Surface - The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep6
programme.desc: The Flopping of the Bullruses - Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep5
programme.desc: Kitty Cat Cam - When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep6
programme.desc: Dollhouse Defenders - When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone but its the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yis rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep1
programme.desc: Everest Returns - Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yis violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yis music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep18
programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep19
programme.desc: Magma Comes to the Surface - The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep20
programme.desc: The Sky Torcher - The Sky Torcher & Flame Throwers invade the Crystal Realm. Tom must conquer his demons and bond with the Fault Ripper to defeat the Sky Torcher.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.desc: A Welsh Trick & Treat - Its Halloween time and the Wanderers get a WanderPost from Odlulu issuing a challenge: Come to my Haunted House in Wales if you dare! Wally and Wenda, arent scared by Odlulu and Fritzs attempt at creating a haunted house with goofy Halloween decorations. So Odlulu uses the magical Haunted House Key to bring a few of the decorations to life.
